meta.description: Lufthansa Business Lounge (Schengen, Gate A26) at Frankfurt Airport (FRA), Terminal 1, Concourse A. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

lounge.name: Lufthansa Business Lounge (Schengen, Gate A26)

location.terminalDirections: Near Gate A26, proceed one level up to the entrance.

lounge.description: Relax at the Lufthansa Business Lounge prior to your Schengen departure from Frankfurt. Enjoy a comfortable, peaceful, and modern environment away from the terminal's hustle and bustle.

general: Children under 2 years old are admitted free with an adult.
warning: This location does not accept passengers in airline uniforms.
To ensure the health and safety of guests, shower facilities will not be available during this time.
regulatory: This location is located in the Schengen departure area of Terminal 1, Concourse A. Passengers departing from a different concourse or terminal should leave sufficient time to reach their gates, as passengers departing from other concourses may need to take the Skyline Train and pass through additional security checks, and distances may be significant.

LoungeBuddy bookings made for this lounge are NOT valid at any other Lufthansa Lounges located at Frankfurt Airport. Access will be denied if the booking is used at a different Lufthansa Lounge location.
Lounge bookings for this location are limited to non-corporate use. A tax invoice (according to respective taxation laws of selected countries) will not be issued.

reviews.content: A bit better-than-average lounge. The food selection is somewhat limited but for drinks, there is a bartender. I miss more space to sit and relax rather than having so many tables for eating.
Sehr voll, aber guter Service. Standardessen und Getränke. Hatte Wartezeit auf der Toilette.
Comfortable and clean, good food, no wait for a shower, not crowded at 1300 on a weekday.
Tiny little lounge with hardly any food options. Last resort when all the other LH lounges are hopelessly overcrowded. Which happens very regularly.
Good staff and food selection, it has a bar but it’s overcrowded sometimes.
A bit of a walk and hard to find but it’s worth it as it’s much less crowded than others. It’s near A26 and it is UPSTAIRS. Signs aren’t clear. Good option for long layovers.
Worth the walk to get here. Much quieter and more space. But beware: it closes early. At 20:00 on Saturday it was already closed.
Fairly small but not too busy. Shower was nice and seats were comfortable.
Worth the trip to A26. Quiet. Comfortable. Large and very clean shower rooms. Very courteous staff.
This lounge is less crowded than other LH lounges, and has great views of the planes and a staffed bar. Worth the "detour".
Great space and good selection of food.
Better alternative than the other LH lounges as it's a bit out of the way and tends to be less crowded. Decent F&B though not as good as the Sen lounge.
Clean, attended bar service with nice hand-made espresso. OK food, clean toilets.
Cool lounge, view on the planes landing.
Nice lounge - not too crowded on a Sunday afternoon.
Generous breakfast buffet. Comfortable seats. Locker-area to store bags. Very satisfied.
Besides not having a smoking room, this lounge is on-point.

location.terminalDirections: Next to Gate A13, Level 2, opposite the Duty Free Shop.
Level 2, opposite the Duty Free Shop, next to Gate A13.
Level 2, opposite the Duty Free Shop, towards Gate A50.
Located behind Airport Entrance 13 (Tor 13) when arriving by car.
After Passport Control, proceed towards Gates B24-B28 and take the lift or stairs to the lounge entrance.
After Passport Control, proceed towards Gates B44-B48 and take the lift or stairs to the lounge entrance.
Departure Area B, next to Gate B22.
Departure Area B, opposite Gate B42, next to Gate B43.
Outside of Passport Control and Security Checkpoint, Arrival Area B, immediately behind the Baggage Claim.
Landside, between Concourses B and C on the Gallery Level, next to the Travel Market (Reisemarkt).
After Passport Control but before final Security Checkpoint, Departure Area C, near Gates C14-C15.
After Passport Control but before final Security Checkpoint, Departure Area C, near Gate C14 and Gate C15.
Level 4, opposite the Duty Free Shop towards Gate Z50.
Level 3, opposite the Duty Free Shop towards Gate Z50.
